title: The Ruins[Cam][English].avi
description: Based on the novel by A Simple Plan author Scott Smith, director Carter B. Smith?s Yucatan-set thriller follows four American tourists as they unwisely venture off the beaten path while vacationing in Cancun. When a friendly German tourist implores the Americans to help search the jungle for his missing brother, the group becomes hopelessly trapped in a nightmare scenario that seems too strange to be true.
